title: Heavy Surf Pummels California's Catalina Island
teaser: While many were excited for the surge of waves from Tropical Storm Marie, they had some devastating effects.
contentencoded:
While many were excited for the surge of waves along the West Coast from Tropical Storm Marie, a former hurricane, the waves had some devastating effects.

Here & Now’s Robin Young discusses the damage with Ben Harvey, city manager of Avalon, California, which is located on Catalina Island.

Guest

  • Ben Harvey, city manager for Avalon, California.
